page.title: 09ROADS AND TRANSPORT (contd.)
page.content:
are no appointed stops although most buses will stop on request at the roadside. Approximately twelve buses run each weekday at hourly intervals. The{Moyadd-Upper}bus only runs on Wednesdays and Saturdays. There is an extra bus on the last Wednesday of each month as this is the Fair day when people come to shop and mingle. The reason this service is so infrequent is because most people in this rural area have their own means of transport.
These are the only public transport services in the area.
Report by Wendy Blue and Alison Gordon of Kilkeel High School.
